Text: apologies for the poor seeding the last few days.  I know most of you are stuck at about 53% but I am having issues with my internet connection and am currently connecting at free wifi spots so seeding will be slow and intermittent.  Hopefully the situation will be resolved soon.

I'm really really sorry for the poor seeding.  I am still having issues with my internet at home (issues like I have no internet to speak of).  I'm trying to get to the library where I can seed for an hour or so but that is difficult sometimes without transportation.  Rest assured that I WILL get this seeded so others can help me eventually.
PLS SEED!  We are all stuck @ 74.2%
apologies.  I am still dealing with no internet at home.
I was able to seed for a couple of hours today but I don't know when I'll be able to get back on

I am happy to see that we finally got enough people to seed so I don't have to worry about getting online.  Thank you to all who are helping by seeding this torrent.  Season 5 should be coming out in the UK this fall and once it does I will try to up it here.
I'm seeding again.  Please do not hit and run.  I can't guarantee how long I'll be able to seed
